settings.text_custom: The Coziest Sweatpants of the Year Our Premium Fleece Sweatpants is an embodiment of oversized comfort & style. Made with 100% skin-friendly materials. This breathable fleece will keep you cozy all year round. Its ultra-soft oversized fit wraps you in warmth like a blanket.

settings.heading: What is Muslin Cotton?
settings.content:
A Fabric Fit for Royalty

Originating from ancient Bengal (modern-day Bangladesh and India), muslin was once so rare and coveted that it was calledÂ "woven wind"â€”worn by queens, emperors, and aristocrats who prized itsÂ weightless luxury. The finest muslin was so sheer it could pass through a ring yet so strong it lasted generations. Today, authentic muslin remains a symbol ofÂ timeless elegance and craftsmanship.

Why Is Muslin Cotton Special?

  • Breathable & Lightweight: Its loose, open weave allows airflow like no other fabric, making itÂ perfect for temperature regulationâ€”cool in summer, cozy in winter.
  • Luxuriously Soft: With every wash, muslin becomes even softer, developing aÂ vintage, lived-in eleganceÂ that only improves with time.
  • Gentle Yet Durable: Despite its delicate feel, high-quality muslin is surprisingly strong, resisting pulls and tears while maintaining its graceful drape.

The Ultimate in Elevated Comfort

Our muslin pyjamas carry forward this legacy, offering youÂ a touch of historical opulence with modern comfort.

settings.heading: Material & Care
settings.content:
100% Hypoallergenic Premium-Grade Polyester

Machine wash cold, tumble dry on low heat, and avoid ironing or using fabric softeners to maintain the softness and coziness of your Hoodie .

settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
All Orders are fulfilled and then shipped to anywhere in theÂ USÂ inÂ 1-3 working daysÂ on average.

All orders come with tracking information once shipped.

Returns

Not happy with your purchase? No worries, we've got you covered!

You may return it within 30 days of delivery for a full refund or exchange, no questions asked. To initiate a return, just contact our customer service team atÂ support@thefleececompany.com.
